name: WPConnect
author: modemlooper

sections.description: Allows users to log into your site with a WordPress.com user account. Adds a WordPress.com connect button to your login form.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  1. From inside your WordPress administration panel, visit ‘Plugins -> Add New’
  2. Search for WPConnect and find this plugin in the results
  3. Click ‘Install’
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  5. Enter WordPress.com application settings on WPConnect admin page

Manual Installation

  1. Upload ‘wpconnect’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter WordPress.com application settings on WPConnect admin page

short_description: Allows users to log into your site with a WordPress.com user account. Adds a WordPress.com connect button to your login form.
